_description: A mid-thirteenth-century English scribble — three lines

BodAsh1285.Transcription: Soruhe and seyheth and bethhold and haue
BodAsh1285.Editions:
Black,  William Henry. 
             Catalogi Codicum Manuscriptorum Bibliothecae Bodleianae…Pars X,
                A…Catalogue of the Manuscripts bequeathed…by Elias Ashmole.
